english.segment1: Don't skate. Don't surf. Don't worry about my turf. I gotta car in the yard. Don't want it to go fast. And I wanna know if I'm coming down with anything. And I've got a hero that I'll follow to the end
english.segment2: I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser. I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser
english.segment3: Don't drink. Don't stink. I change my own bed sheets. I read. I write. I can't stay up at night. And I wanna know if I'm going down with anything. And I've got a hero that I'll follow to the end
english.segment4: I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser. I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser. I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser. I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser
english.segment5: Don't smoke. Hate dope. Don't laugh at dirty jokes. Gotta mum and a dad. Only ones I ever had. And I wanna know if I'm growing old from anything. And I've got a hero that I'll follow to the end
english.segment6: I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser. I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser. I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser. I'm an ex (EX) an exerciser
